name: Qualee
description: Qualee is an award-winning employee experience platform designed to empower organizational alignment and belonging. We make it simple for companies of all sizes to drive continuous engagement, gather actionable insights, and curate exciting journeys. Our A.I. enabled solution allows the creation of interactive workflows, automates compliance requirements, and measurably improves engagement. Qualee is a diversity-led organization and our platform is offered in twenty of the world’s most widely used languages.
features: Create connection and belonging from anywhere
Scale the power of your people and business
Headline: Employee experiences to power business success
ShortDescription: Qualee creates better employee experiences with all the data insights along the way

Highlights.name: Employee Engagement
Highlights.description: Actionable insights by giving everyone a voice.

Highlights.name: Learning & Skills
Highlights.description: A growth culture built on continuous learning.

enhanced_description: Qualee is an award-winning, A.I.-enabled employee experience platform designed to foster organizational alignment, belonging, and continuous engagement. It supports companies of all sizes by simplifying the creation of interactive workflows, automating compliance, and providing actionable insights. The platform curates exciting employee journeys across various HR functions, including onboarding, career management, impactful transitions, and continuous learning and skill development. Qualee measurably improves engagement and delivers actionable insights by giving every employee a voice. It is globally accessible, offered in twenty of the world's most widely used languages.
scalability_features: Designed for scalability across all company sizes
Scales the power of people and business
